# wangsu_waap_share_whitelists (Data Source)

Use this data source to query whitelist rules for shared configurations.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "wangsu_waap_share_whitelists" "demo" {
  rule_name = "tf_test"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
